subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins of Britain, the Tour de France winner, finished in a tie for last in the opening leg of the Tour of Oman, more than 80 seconds beyond the stage winner, Marcel Kittel of Germany.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins of Britain, the Tour de France winner, finished in a tie for last in the opening leg of the Tour of Oman, more than 80 seconds beyond the stage winner, Marcel Kittel of Germany.
